data.name: Content_AddButton
data.comment: The text on the button which adds a trial with steps containing the selected stimulus and locator objects.

data.name: Content_AddStep
data.comment: The text content for the button which adds a step in AddTrialView

data.name: Content_AddTrial
data.comment: The text content for the button which adds a trial in AddTrialView

data.name: Error_ImageCannotLoad
data.comment: The message for the exception thrown when a stimulus image could not be loaded

data.name: Error_StimulusFileNotFound
data.value: Stimulus file can not be found:
data.comment: The message for the exception thrown when a stimulus can not be found

data.name: FileFilter_Experiment
data.comment: The file name pattern used in the dialog that loads a previously recorded experiment

data.name: FileFilter_Html
data.comment: The file name pattern used in the dialog that loads an HTML file

data.name: FileFilter_Image
data.comment: The file name pattern used in the dialog that loads image files

data.name: Header_ElementsPanel
data.comment: The header text for the ElementsPanel of HurPsyExp

data.name: Header_ExperimentMenu
data.comment: The header text for the Experiment menu of HurPsyExp

data.name: Header_ExperimentPanel
data.comment: The header text for the ExperimentPanel

data.name: Header_SettingsPanel
data.comment: The header text for the AppSettings Panel in DesignWindow

data.name: Header_LoadExperimentMenuItem
data.comment: The label for the menu item that loads an experiment from file

data.name: Header_LocatorPanel
data.comment: The header text for the LocatorPanel in the ElementsPanel

data.name: Header_NewExperimentMenuItem
data.comment: The label for the menu item that creates a new experiment

data.name: Header_ResponsePanel
data.comment: The header text for the ResponsePanel in ElementsPanel

data.name: Header_SaveExperimentMenuItem
data.comment: The label for the menu item that saves the experiment in a file

data.name: Header_RunExperimentMenuItem
data.comment: The label for the menu item that runts the experiment in the way it was designed

data.name: Header_StimulusPanel
data.comment: The header text for the StimuliPanel in the ElementsPanel

data.name: Label_IsFixed
data.comment: The label text for the CheckBox which toggles the IsFixed property in AddTrialDialog

data.name: Label_FontSize
data.comment: The label text for the slider to set UIFontSize on Design Preferences panel

data.name: Tooltip_FontSize
data.value: Font size for major UI elements
data.comment: The label text for the slider to set UIFontSize on Design Preferences panel

data.name: Label_StepTime
data.comment: The label text for the TextBox which sets the step time in AddTrial dialog

data.name: Title_AddTrialDialog
data.comment: The title of the dialog window where Stimulus and Locator Ids are selected to form trials

data.name: Title_DesignWindow
data.comment: The title of the experiment design window

data.name: Title_RunWindow
data.comment: The title of the experiment run window

data.name: Title_StartupDialog
data.comment: The title of the startup dialog where the user chooses whether to design or run an experiment

data.name: Tooltip_AddBlock
data.comment: The tooltip for the toolbar button which adds a new block of trials

data.name: Tooltip_AddHtmlStimulus
data.comment: The tooltip for the toolbar button which adds an Html page as stimulus

data.name: Tooltip_AddImageStimulus
data.comment: The tooltip for the toolbar button which adds an image stimulus

data.name: Tooltip_AddStimulusMenu
data.comment: The tooltip for the dropdown menu item which adds a stimulus

data.name: Header_AddStimulusMenu
data.comment: The header text for the dropdown menu item which adds a stimulus

data.name: Tooltip_AddKeyResponse
data.comment: The tooltip for the toolbar button which adds a nkey response definition

data.name: Tooltip_AddPointLocator
data.comment: The tooltip for the toolbar button which adds a point-type locator

data.name: Tooltip_AddTrial
data.comment: The tooltip for the ContextMenu item which adds new trials in BlockTemplate

data.name: Header_AddTrial
data.comment: The header text for the ContextMenu item which adds new trials in BlockTemplate

data.name: Tooltip_DeleteObject
data.comment: tooltip for the button which issues a Delete command for the object

data.name: Tooltip_EditObject
data.comment: The tooltip for the button that makes the object properties editable

data.name: Tooltip_ResizeSlider
data.comment: The tooltip for the width changing slider in the "HorizontallyResizableControl" template

data.name: Tooltip_SelectObject
data.comment: The tooltip for the button which selects an object in an ItemsControl

data.name: Tooltip_StimulusId
data.comment: The tooltip for the textbox that sets the Id of a Stimulus item

data.name: Tooltip_LocatorId
data.comment: The tooltip for the textbox that sets the Id of a Locator item

data.name: Tooltip_VisualStimulusHeight
data.comment: The tooltip for the textbox that sets the height in VisualStimulusTemplate

data.name: Tooltip_VisualStimulusWidth
data.comment: The tooltip for the textbox that sets the width in VisualStimulusTemplate

data.name: Tooltip_ItemView
data.comment: The tooltip for the view-toggle button when items view is active for ListBoxes lbStimulusDefs and lbLocatorDefs

data.name: Tooltip_IconView
data.comment: The tooltip for the view-toggle button when icons view is active for ListBoxes lbStimulusDefs and lbLocatorDefs

data.name: Label_SmallFontSize
data.comment: The label text for the slider to set SmallFontSize on Preferences panel

data.name: Tooltip_SmallFontSize
data.value: Font size for item views and inner forms
data.comment: The label text for the slider to set SmallFontSize on Preferences panel

data.comment: The label text for the slider to set MenuFontSize on Preferences panel

data.value: Font size for main window menus

data.comment: The label text for the slider to set CommandButtonHeight on Preferences panel

data.comment: The label text for the slider to set ImagePreviewHeight on Preferences panel

data.comment: The label text for the slider to set ImagePreviewHeight on Preferences panel

data.name: Label_DesignExperiment
data.comment: The label for the radio button on StartWindow that will open the design window

data.name: Label_RunExperiment
data.comment: The label for the radio button on StartWindow that will open the run window

data.name: Tooltip_PointLocatorX
data.comment: The tooltip for the TextBox which sets the X position of a PointLocator

data.name: Tooltip_PointLocatorY
data.comment: The tooltip for the TextBox which sets the Y position of a PointLocator

data.name: Tooltip_ImageStimulus
data.comment: The tooltip for the icon image in ImageStimulusItemTemplate

data.name: Tooltip_HtmlStimulus
data.comment: The tooltip for the icon image in HtmlStimulusItemTemplate

data.name: Tooltip_PointLocator
data.comment: The tooltip for the icon image in PointLocatorItemTemplate

data.name: Label_AddLocatorChoice
data.comment: The label text for the textblock associated with the ComboBox on AddingTrialDialog which adds locator choices for the planned new trials

data.comment: The tooltip for the ComboBox on AddingTrialDialog which adds a Locator choice for the planned new trials

data.value: Right click to open the Block menu
